description hero: Software engineer with over 7 years of experience in Full-Stack development, specializing in languages such as Python, PHP and JS, and database administration including MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle and MongoDB. My leadership has been evident in leading development teams, cultivating collaboration and ensuring the successful delivery of innovative projects.
subtitle1: Listening to and valuing each team member is fundamental to their motivation and joint success. Leading is leading by example, supporting and learning from everyone around you.
subtitle2: Anticipating trends, setting clear objectives and adapting quickly are keys to sustained success.
subtitle3: Effective project management focuses on defining clear objectives, prioritizing tasks and maintaining fluid communication, ensuring that the team moves together towards shared goals.
description1: Specialist in the development and execution of projects with strong PHP and JavaScript skills, contributing to the continuous improvement and stability of the core software. Experience collaborating with multidisciplinary teams to align projects with strategic business objectives, evidencing a strong commitment to innovation and technological excellence.
description2: Developer in intranet application communication using SOAP protocol, optimizing system integration and improving operational efficiency. Key in core software support, ensuring stability and functionality of strategic applications.
description3: Full Stack Developer with experience in technical support to multinationals, specialized in PHP. Outstanding for collaborating in multidisciplinary teams to design and optimize integrated solutions, committed to innovation and efficiency through constant technological updating.
